  • Method Details

    • create

      public abstract void create()
      Method should handle the INIFileSection initialization.

    • initNamedValues

      public void initNamedValues()
      Method should handle initialization of named values. E.g.: Use si.ijs.kt.clus.util.jeans.io.ini.INIFileInt.setNamedValue(int, String) and similar methods. This method is not used by all settings sections. It is not abstract, so that it does not have to be implemented by all those sections that do not need it.

    • validateSettingsInternal

      public List<String> validateSettingsInternal()
      This method should be overriden to check for inconsistencies in the section settings. It is called by si.ijs.kt.clus.main.settings.Settings.validateSettingsCompatibility() method. If several sections are needed to determine if inconsistencies exist, implement the logic in si.ijs.kt.clus.main.settings.Settings.validateSettingsCombined().

    • getPosition

      public int getPosition()
      Returns the position of this section in the INI file
      Returns:
      Position

    • getSection

      public INIFileSection getSection()
      Returns INI section

    • formatInvalid

      public static String formatInvalid(INIFileEntry settingEntry, Object settingValue)
      Convenience method for denoting illegal settings

    • formatInvalid

      public static String formatInvalid(INIFileEntry settingEntry, Object settingValue, String additionalMessage)
      Convenience method for denoting illegal settings
